feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms B702/B703/B707/B709 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 10:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/03/2026 10:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers located in rooms B702, B703, B707 and B709 might be temporarily unavailable from 10:30 UTC during the maintenance .
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2][Storage and Backups] - Backup Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 22, 13:00 UTC  -  Jan 23, 03:00 UTC

Jan 14, 21:10 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Storage and Backups offer.

Start time : 22/01/2026 13:00 UTC
End time : 23/01/2026 03:00 UTC
Service impact : A temporary downtime of approximately 30 minutes is expected. During this maintenance window, your data will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement : As part of our responsibilities for the Ftpback servers, we will be performing maintenance on the entire fleet.
This maintenance will include an update to the storage servers hosting your data.
The new version will bring improvements to security mechanisms as well as performance enhancements.


Thank you for your understanding.
